Text:
I loved Marvels Supernatural stuff from the 70's so thank you so much for this!

Now I can only hope you have the Living Mummy series!!!  if you could upload that, it would be great!!!


BTW: Did you get my Godzilla Torrent?  It's been up and running for a couple days now as I had to reupload the whole thing.  Just wondering

i did get those godzillas, Mothra67. thanks very much! i think i saw the supernatural thrillers back issues when i searched for brother voodoo, so the likelihood of a mummy torrent is high. probably won't be today though.
